Apple Inc. (NASDAQ: $AAPL) – Apple Store Workers At Grand Central Terminal In NYC Take Steps To Unionize https://www.billionaireclubcollc.com/apple-inc-nasdaqaapl-apple-store-workers-at-grand-central-terminal-in-nyc-take-steps-to-unionize/

links.title: Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL) - Apple Store Workers At Grand Central Terminal In NYC Take Steps To Unionize
links.description: Apple Inc (NASDAQ: AAPL) workers at the retail store in New York City's Grand Central Terminal have taken steps toward forming a union. The organizers of the union, who go by Fruit Stand Workers United, announced on their website that they voted to affiliate themselves with the Workers United labor union on February 21st, 2022.

$SPY $TSLA $AAPL $FB $NVDA  

My thoughts on the week ahead  .... 

First, a quick tip that is the most important reason for my success - learn to take losses. I take plenty of them. I feel confident enough that of 10 trades, at least 8 will be profitable. But those two losses  have the potential to wipeout all 8 gains if I do not manage them correctly. 

In this week's Game Plan I am sending out in a few hours, I will go over the stocks that will continue to work in this environment, a list of growth names I think will be excellent long term buys (when the dust settles), the technical setup for the SPY to begin the week, and my "Top 10" list of trading/investing advice for current mkts. To join, feel free to email me at: jessielivermore1929@gmail.com 

We enter what is for me, the biggest earnings season in decades given all the headwinds facing the mkt. TSLA kicks things off. Is it perhaps the key to the direction in equities? We shall see. ✌️

$AAPL Apple Store Workers At Grand Central Terminal In NYC Take Steps To Unionize 

https://newsfilter.io/a/81ef1b6796ebe070087e53c4cc6ecc25

$SPY $QQQ $AMD $NVDA $AAPL ATTN RETAIL INVESTORS: For those who follow this guy, pls be careful. He's admitting he's a money manager, who doesn't take guidance from ST, but we're to believe he somehow has the good heart to give it to retail investors right here on ST. The same ppl who want your cheap stocks are telling you to listen to them. Yes, pay attention to what they're selling, but before you buy, at least understand who they are.

Big Investor Halves Stake in AMC Stock and Trims Apple. It Bought PayPal and Pfizer

$AMC $AAPL $PYPL $PFE

https://www.marketwatch.com/articles/amc-stock-apple-paypal-pfizer-51649865375?mod=newsviewer_click

symbols.title: AMC Entertainment Holdings Inc - Ordinary Shares - Class A

links.title: Big Investor Halves Stake in AMC Stock and Trims Apple. It Bought PayPal and Pfizer.
links.description: A large European asset manager slashed its investment in the volatile shares of a movie-theater chain, and made other changes in its U.S.-traded stock portfolio. DNB Asset Management more than halved its position in AMC Entertainment Holding (ticker: AMC), trimmed a stake in iPhone maker Apple (AAPL), and materially raised investments in payments firm PayPal Holdings (PYPL) and Covid-19 vaccine maker Pfizer (PFE).

links.title: Another China Lockdown Threatens This Apple Product
links.description: As electric vehicle maker Tesla is preparing to resume operations at its Gigafactory Shanghai after shutting down since March 28 for a Covid-19 lockdown, tech giant Apple faces a new threat of a manufacturing shutdown in China for one of its popular products.

body: Apple Calls Facebook Hypocrite As Bitter Verbal Battle Charges On https://www.billionaireclubcollc.com/apple-calls-facebook-hypocrite-as-bitter-verbal-battle-charges-on/  $AAPL $FB

links.title: Apple Calls Facebook Hypocrite As Bitter Verbal Battle Charges On
links.description: Apple Inc AAPL has called out Meta Platforms Inc FB for charging creators close to 50% for all virtual sales in its metaverse. What Happened: Earlier this week, Meta said it would take a 47.5% fee from creators selling virtual assets in its Horizon Worlds metaverse.
